META.TITLE: Home | FEIT Code
META.DESCRIPTION: Coding exam platform for FEIT university students.

HERO.PARAGRAPH: Write it. Test it. See your results. Leave no doubt.

FEATURES.HEADING: We made coding exams <line>fast, easy & reliable</line>
FEATURES.PARAGRAPH: Helping Students take and Teachers make - high quality exams, all while doing it frictionless.

LIST.TITLE: Collaborate
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Study and manage multiple courses. Make/Take coding exams in various programming languages.

LIST.TITLE: Save time
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Write and review code much faster. Save time for the things that matter in life.

LIST.TITLE: Coding IDE
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Take the exams using FEIT Code's IDE and get instant results!

LIST.TITLE: Feedback system
LIST.DESCRIPTION: Get instant feedback for each coding problem, as well as comprehensive grading on your entire exam.

TESTIMONIALS.HEADING: Testimonials & Reviews
TESTIMONIALS.PARAGRAPH: Check out what our <students>fellow students</students> have to say about us

LIST.TEXT: The new web app for programming exams at FEIT has made the whole process so much smoother.
LIST.NAME: Elena Vcheva
